The plot revolves around Christopher Doogan, who is released from prison after serving a long sentence for stealing millions of dollars in cash and banknotes that had been scattered throughout different countries and cities all over the world.

Refusing to give up Christopher finds strength to move on in unexpected places.

I would recommend "The Amazing Spider-Man". This movie stars Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, who play the lead roles of Peter Parker and Mary Jane Watson respectively.

The plot follows Peter Parker, a high school student with extraordinary abilities including Spider-Man's ability to shoot spider-like venom from his wrists. After being bitten by a genetically altered spider while on his way home after a long day at work as an insurance salesperson. After being bitten by the genetically altered spider, he gains newfound, spider-like powers and ventures out to save the city from the machinations of a mysterious reptilian foe.

Overall, "The Amazing Spider-Man" is an action-packed movie that stars Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone, who play the lead roles of Peter Parker and Mary Jane Watson respectively. Overall, this movie is well worth watching, especially if you're a fan of action movies.
